suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more detailed line work to the children's clothing and hair. This could involve using finer lines to create patterns or textures on the dresses and adding more intricate details to the hair, such as individual strands or braids. Additionally, incorporating varied line weights and styles in these areas can help to create a sense of depth and definition, making the characters stand out more prominently. This approach will complement the existing dynamic lines and contribute to a more cohesive and visually engaging piece.
